</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

This header provides classes for managing per-loop analyses.

These are typically used as part of a loop pass pipeline over the loop nests of a function.

Loop analyses are allowed to make some simplifying assumptions: 1) Loops are, where possible, in simplified form. 2) Loops are <em>always</em> in LCSSA form. 3) A collection of analysis results are available:
<ul>
<li>LoopInfo</li>
<li>DominatorTree</li>
<li>ScalarEvolution</li>
<li>AAManager</li>
</ul>


The primary mechanism to provide these invariants is the loop pass manager, but they can also be manually provided in order to reason about a loop from outside of a dedicated pass manager.

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopanalysismanagerfunctionproxy/result/#a047a9fa29538876a3d48f7c97980e8ac"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopanalysismanagerfunctionproxy/result/#a047a9fa29538876a3d48f7c97980e8ac">~Result</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// InnerAM is cleared in a moved from state where there is nothing to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!InnerAM)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clear out the analysis manager if we&#39;re being destroyed -- it means we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// didn&#39;t even see an invalidate call when we got invalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    InnerAM-&gt;clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Mark MemorySSA as used so we can invalidate self if MSSA is invalidated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopanalysismanagerfunctionproxy/result/#ac5dd4078b26f26598fae0fe0c9b893c4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopanalysismanagerfunctionproxy/result/#ac5dd4078b26f26598fae0fe0c9b893c4">markMSSAUsed</a>() &#123; MSSAUsed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Accessor for the analysis manager.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopanalysismanagerfunctionproxy/result/#a47feb8711d612c46a16284bf8f284edc"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a58dde534a0ea2a23cb6c779c5c283f75">LoopAnalysisManager</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopanalysismanagerfunctionproxy/result/#a47feb8711d612c46a16284bf8f284edc">getManager</a>() &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;InnerAM; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Handler for invalidation of the proxy for a particular function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If the proxy, \\c LoopInfo, and associated analyses are preserved, this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// will merely forward the invalidation event to any cached loop analysis</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// results for loops within this function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If the necessary loop infrastructure is not preserved, this will forcibly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// clear all of the cached analysis results that are keyed on the \\c</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// LoopInfo for this function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopanalysismanagerfunctionproxy/result/#a75c73b4e1766a4a21df494320f1e8cde"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopanalysismanagerfunctionproxy/result/#a75c73b4e1766a4a21df494320f1e8cde">invalidate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses">PreservedAnalyses</a> &amp;PA,</span></CodeLine>
